channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Ryan Berg and Diego Marroquin Bitar in the San Diego Union Tribune: U.S., Mexico and Canada must extend productive trade agreement
item.description: Americas Program Director Ryan C. Berg and Fellow Diego Marroquin Bitar argue that extending the USMCA agreement will protect jobs, strengthen supply chains, and keep North America competitive.
